summary: A psychopath on the run takes a job as a handyman at the house of a lonely war widow.
cast: Ida Lupino|Robert Ryan|Taylor Holmes|Barbara Whiting|James Willmas|O.Z. Whitehead|Shelly Lynn Anderson|Corky|Jeanne Eggenweiler|Jimmy Mobley|Brad Morrow|Ronnie Patterson|Dee Pollock|William Talman
keywords: christmas|christmas tree|dog|polishing a floor|aunt niece relationship
title: Beware, My Lovely
